title: Get Orin's Netherstone
content:
Get Orin's Netherstone Type Quest Act Act 3 Location Bhaal Temple Reward Crimson MischiefBloodthirst

Get Orin's Netherstone

Get Orin's Netherstone is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Get Orin's Netherstone can be acquired during Act 3 as part of Confront the Elder Brain. Complete this Quest to obtain one of the Three Netherstones that you need to collect. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to
